sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Grant Information Collection Act.

sections.heading: Grant information collection. The Secretary of Innovation and Technology shall coordinate with each State agency to develop, with any existing or newly available resources and technology, appropriate systems to accurately report data containing financial information
